content.detailedDescription: Shortly before 9p.M. got out of my truck and saw two clusters of three with six individual red orange glowing orbs in the sky.  they were coming from the north and turned west and elevated past the cloud cover.  i ran into the house, got my mom and two nephews to look at what was going on in the sky also.  lasted a good 4-5 mins. they moved at a slow pace but would speed up and slow back down to the same slow pace.  made no sound. even had time to get binoculars, but couldn't see any more detail.  they all took the same path in the sky, coming from the north turning west. i did have time to make a short video, but it is not very good.  i didn't think it was even picking up the light, but i will upload it.
content.summary: Red orange glowing balls.  changed speeds and directions

content.detailedDescription:
Here in san mateo, california:

last saturday around 7 p.M.,  i was in my living room and through the front window (eastern side), i saw a light in the sky that was out of the area of the traffic of airplanes that travel from south to north to sfo.

i immediately went outside and saw a large ball of orange light in the sky in the east towards 101 freeway direction.   it was at a 40 degree angle because i began to use my fist to measure.  i am very familiar with the sky since my hobby is astronomy.  the orange bright object was hoving there and wiggling.

it was a bright orange ball of light.   the neighbors began looking at it and i yelled for my brother to come.   he started to walk outside like he didn't not care, but as soon as he looked up in the sky, his reaction changed to  "oh shit!"  ohhhh my god!"

we were watching it as it was hovering in the same spot, wiggled up and down and i was saying, "it is not an airplane, it is not a star,  it is not a meteor,  it can't be a flare since flares slowly descend.  plus this object was bigger than a flare and much bigger than any star.   it was still kind of light outside since it was 7 p.M.

we were shocked!   it was there for around 10 minutes then it began to like go up deeper into the sky and disappeared.

i then tried to look up to see if it came out in the news.  in yahoo i looked up  "orange ufo"  and found that there were quiet a lot of sightings of orange ufo's in california.

this was very strange!
content.summary: A bright orange ball of light much bigger than a star or planet hovering and wiggling in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
1) driving on 422 east between trooper and the oaks exits (directly across from the christian academy but on the valley forge side of the road.
2) unusal, very before spotted in that area. 
3) from far away it looked like a raido tower, but there was 3 white lights and no red flashing light.
4) 20 ft off ground, object did not move while i was watching. there was three white ligths (not blidning however i could not see above the side of the ufo). 
5) called my friend who was following me to make sure she saw it too. she did and we both were in complete shock. she first thought it was a fighter jet however when we got closer there was no markings, no color, no amo and it did not move.
6) continued to drive on 422.
content.summary: Ufo spotted on 422 east heading towards oaks

content.detailedDescription:
1,i was in the back seat of our car. tormenting my sister.
2, the car's power and engine died from front to rear and freaked out my father. then we noticed a distortion above, about 7:00 high and west, n.West.
3, my dad scrambled to get the car running, i was mesmerized and could not move.
4,i really cant.
5,fear,awe,panic, could not move or speak for what seemed to a child like hours.
6,never really had sight of it. it was just a blur or distortion in the sky.
since then i believe the car dieing and coming  back on was some kind of emp.Event.Have no reasonable explanation of what happened or the strange events afterwards.
content.summary: Like a blury transperency that turned the power off in our car

content.detailedDescription:
4 of us saw this object in the sky making movement in a zig zag pattern. it lasted about 30 minutes. we all watched in silence. then it just shot up in the air and was gone. this happened many years ago but i still remember it as it happened yesterday. 

at the time we were moving from oahau to the big island for training (military) and was getting ready to bed down. someone looked up in the sky and brought it to our attention. our thoughts were it was a ufo. we had been up for about 24 hours with no sleep and was getting ready to bed down for a couple of hours. we never did say anything to any one about seeing it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A white object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: My wife and had just arrived home and were getting out of the car when i noticed out of tahe preverbal conner of my eye,a light streaking towards the hillside approximate ly 1/4 mile away from our homes location it appeared to glow and move in avery steady motion toward the hill side and just before what appeared to be a collision it abruptly changed direction , upward and kind of followed the contour of the hillside until it reached about what i estimate to be approx. 50 feet above the hill and the just seemed to go straight away from that same proximity  and my location i continued to watch for another few min. and decided no wononewould believe me anyway so i just put it in the back of my mind ,until i was watching a ufo show on tv and a person decried almost identical experience at some other location that i didn't catch. was today 8/5 /2011 about 6:00 pm on chanel planet green .The object drifted into the distant sky at about 45 degrees from my location .My wife did see the same object (ball of light), however she thought that it was some home boys messing around and did not give it the same interest that i apparently was impressed with .This truly was an unusual experience to say the least.I guess i would conceder myself a believing sceptic but i hesitate to exclude anything from possibility .However aim really freaking out about this incident .
content.summary: Bright nite  didn't remember seeing moon or other heavenly bodies just this object vision

content.detailedDescription: Heading west on hwy 119 at about 15:00 - 15:15, in longmont,co. lookin at the mtns and witness 3 objects, one at 11 o'clock (hovering), one at 4 o'clock (moving north slowly) and one in the middle rotating from side to side or like a wobble. i could see the middle of craft when it did this. guessing that they may have about 30 miles from me and guessing thier size to be 150 to 200 ft in diameter. just wondering if anybody besides me that saw this..
content.summary: 3 of them

content.detailedDescription:
I was a mary kay consultant at the time and was making a delivery to a client's home sometime between 7 and 9 pm. i can't recall what time of year it was. i was in her neighborhood - small road, large homes, lots of trees. slightly ahead of me i saw this thing in the sky. it was dark with three large round lights positioned in a triangular shape. it looked like it was moving just above the trees, in the same direction as the road i was traveling. it looked too big, too triangular, and too close to the ground to be an airplane. i rolled down my windows and heard absolutely nothing other than normal night sounds. i was surprised something could be travelling so low and making no noise. it was traveling somewhere around 20 - 35 miles an hour. the road i was on kept the object in view for about a minute or minute-and-a-half. unfortunately the road curved and the object continued on its straight path. the trees were too dense for me to get anyplace that would allow me to scan the sky for any distance other than directly above me.

i was curious, then frustrated that i couldn't get it back in view. as i was watching it i was trying to convince myself it was something normal and trying to figure out what it could be other than a ufo. i just couldn't come up with anything.

i didn't mention it to anyone other than my husband. then tonight (8/5/11) i was watching ufos over earth, "the bucks county flap" episode, on planet green. in the episode with a woman named denise described an object that sounded similar to what i had seen. i was amaze when the computer animation mufon made of her sighting -- triangular with three lights -- looked exactly like what i had seen that night. i mean exactly. stunned me enough to look you guys up and fill this out.
content.summary: Large triangle with 3 lights - one at each corner - moving slowly above the trees

content.detailedDescription:
I was a mary kay consultant at the time and was making a delivery to a client's home sometime between 7 and 9 pm. i can't recall what time of year it was. i was in her neighborhood - small road, large homes, lots of trees. slightly ahead of me i saw this thing in the sky. it was dark with three large round lights positioned in a triangular shape. it looked like it was moving just above the trees, in the same direction as the road i was traveling. it looked too big, too triangular, and too close to the ground to be an airplane. i rolled down my windows and heard absolutely nothing other than normal night sounds. i was surprised something could be travelling so low and making no noise. it was traveling somewhere around 20 - 35 miles an hour. the road i was on kept the object in view for about a minute or minute-and-a-half. unfortunately the road curved and the object continued on its straight path. the trees were too dense for me to get anyplace that would allow me to scan the sky for any distance other than directly above me.

i was curious, then frustrated that i couldn't get it back in view. as i was watching it i was trying to convince myself it was something normal and trying to figure out what it could be other than a ufo. i just couldn't come up with anything.

i didn't mention it to anyone other than my husband. then tonight (8/5/11) i was watching ufos over earth, "the bucks county flap" episode, on planet green. in the episode with a woman named denise described an object that sounded similar to what i had seen. i was amaze when the computer animation mufon made of her sighting -- triangular with three lights -- looked exactly like what i had seen that night. i mean exactly. stunned me enough to look you guys up and fill this out.
content.summary: Large triangle with 3 lights - one at each corner - moving slowly above the trees

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside to my car to get my lighter and all the sudden i just so happens to look up and noticed this big bright light in the sky and my first thought was is that the north star and i looked around and found the north star and it was microscopic. compared to this object so i knew it was something odd and out of place so i yelled to my mother who was home at the time to go grab her digital camera and she did so i took a few photos and for some reason the object would wind up being a squiggly line on the camera and it didn't make amny sence because i was taking steady shots so it was almost like the object was moving so fast the camera couldn't keep up but the object was so far away it looked stationary so finally i got 3 to 4 great shots with the object perfectly im place and not moving so at this time mr and my mother still didn't know what it was or w hat we were looking so i decided to bring the photos inside and put the images on my playstation 3 so i could zoom in in it andbsee what it was and what i saw was a shape of an object that reminded be of a game called gallega that was popular years ago not the ship but one of the objects you would have to shoot at on this game so i got to looking even closer and i noticed a perfectly round black object that you couldn't see with the naked eye and i thought well maybe its the moon but it couldn't have been the moon because it was a clear night and the moon wouldn't be black and it was to small to be the moon and then i looked closer and noticed another black circle that i couldn't see unless i zoomed in in it and then i knew i had something that needed to be seriously looked at and studied and i never knew where to go or who to show but today i sej5en the name of your establishment om tv and
content.summary: Walked outside seen bright light and got great photos that need analyzed i found 2 other crafts that couldnt be seen by naked eye or so i think

content.detailedDescription: I was about 24 and was in the backyard of my parents home by myself. i saw 3 starlike bright lights. at first i thought they were just bright stats. but i found em unusual because they were unrecognizable stars.  so...After watching for about 2 min. the three starlights converged into a tight triangle. they sat still in that formation for another minute or 2. then the light seemed to asend very fast, straight up into space. the lights just twinkled out of site. very unusual no sound and moved way to fast to have been a helicopter. i'm sure it was not from this world. true story!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw 3 starlike bright lights.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a cylinder shaped ufo june 21, 2011, between 10 and 11 pm. it was a clear night, the longest day of the year. i live in a  cul-de-sac in a quiet subdivision in east orlando, fl. i was walking my dog when i looked up and saw a large cylinder object come over a tall tree moving in a southeasterly direction. it didn't have wings or windows and was moving fairly slowly. it was a bright white silver color and the back end was red like when a cigarette is inhaled but there was no smoke trail and no sound. i watched it for about a minute before it disappeared over trees. i was trying to figure out what it could be and why it would be allowed so close to trees and houses with that large heat thing in the back. i couldn't make sense of it so i started looking on line which led me to ufo websites.  i was skeptical at first but then excited that other people have witnessed the same type object. i had never heard of a cylinder type ufo. anyway, i'm glad to have seen it and hope to see it again.
content.summary: June 21, 2011, about 10:30 pm saw cylinder shaped ufo moving slowly across the sky

content.detailedDescription: Me and my gilrfriend were parked on a mesa we were looking at the sandia mountains. we noticed some very strange lights at the base of the mountains. the lights were moving right then left up, and down. we sat there for a couple of hours just watching.I then decided to drive to the base of the mountains witch took about 30min from were we were. by the time we got to where we thought we saw the lights the sun was coming up. we drove through the streets in that area and noticed that parts of the streets looked like they had been melted and the shruds on the side of the streets were smushed down in a circlar shape.The green city electrical boxes you see on the side of streets were blown apart but had no sign of a fire or explosion. as we were driving we noticed every 5 or 6 houses people were packing there cars with luggage and seemed to be very worried about something. i then took my girlfriend home. so at 2:00am we took a drive back to the same place and parked the car on the side of the road at the base of the mountains. not but10min little orbes of light would blink on and off through out the feildes of shrub we were parked by. there was an energy that i have never felt before it was if every hair on my body was sticking straight up and i felt so alive. i continued to go to the base of the mountains for several week every night and saw the same thing. government vehicales (vans) would be parked at the top of my street. the local news stated if you see anything weird in the sky the military is testing weather bollons.If you need more information e-mail me. thank you.
content.summary: Orbes of light surrounded my car. city elictrical boxes in that neigbor hood were destroyed the streets were melted in stops mail boxes were torn apart. after a few weeks of this governmet vehicles would follow me and park down my street.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on my deck (2 stories up), and noticed an object moving perfectly straight (west), rather quickly. upon observation i realized it clearly wasn't a bird. i ran inside and grabbed my camera just to zoom in on it for a closer look. in less than 15 seconds (i'm an amateur photographer so my camera was close by), i came back out and got 1 pic before running out onto my front lawn to try to get another one. i watched it disappear into a cloud before i could do so. within 5 mins the sky was extremely darkened by very odd and dark clouds. i noticed 2 small flashes of light which i took to be the coming of a thunderstorm, though it never materialized. i thought perhaps the object was a balloon, but it wasn't very windy out, and in my experience balloons generally move rather erratically, following the direction of the wind,not perfectly straight at the same speed. i think perhaps it was some sort of environmental monitor (i live within a mile of an epa superfund site), but i thought i would share regardless since i've never seen anything even remotely resembling it. after the sun set there were several helicopters in the general area which may be unrelated, i see those often near the epa site, but usually just one.
content.summary: Small basketball sized object moving quickly 40 or so ft from the ground.

content.detailedDescription: I am writing to report sightings of ufo activity at my house and around the area. on approximately july 9, 201i while rinsing my driveway after cutting the grass i noticed a bright white light which was behind me.  when   i turned to look back there was a space craft going down next to the cell phone tower which is next to my house.  this was not the first strange sighting i had seen next to the cell phone tower. after the event of approximately july 9, 2011 when the space craft went down next to the cell tower the white light on the cell tower has not been working at night. the white light on top of the cell phone tower  goes  out  completely only the red lights which are down lower on the cell tower  are on. in the morning the white light on the cell phone tower comes back on it works all day and goes off again at night. the white light on the cell phone tower has not been on at night since.  ever since the event of approximately july 9,2011 i have seen the space craft fly down  right next to the cell phone tower over   my house on several occasions.  last night 8/5/11 my daughter who is 13 years old came bolting in the back door to tell me it flew passed the cell phone tower and over the back yard. she had been standing at the front door waiting for me to unlock the front   door while i went in the back door to open it.  she ran to the back door bolting through it to let me know it flew passed the cell tower over our yard again. on  saturday  night approximately july 16, 2011@  10:33 pm the craft  flew right next to the cell phone tower and over my driveway where i had been sitting in my car  i clearly saw it has two headlights which almost look faded yellow white three lights on the side in a row and  one red  light on top and two red lights in back  it does not have wings  these space craft sit in the sky rather low where you can see they look sort or yellow in the sky  and  begin to fly very low as soon as it gets dark. you can see them every night. one starts off from the exact same place every night by my sister���s apartment.  it sits there and starts off from that point flying low and quiet. on approximately july 22, 2011 there was another type space craft which flew straight over my house which had a triangle shape it has six bright white  lights  and red lights on the bottom of the space craft . i have seen the movement of this space craft it stays up high in the sky twinkles like a star you can see the shape is triangle with the bright white light on the bottom it appears as a star @ approximately 1:30-2:30 am  it starts coming straight  down directly  it sways slightly right then left circles a tiny bit and then drops ,again it sways right left and drops until it finally reaches  close to the top of the trees behind my house at approximately 4:30am-5:30 am and goes down behind the trees where i am un-able to see where it lands. i also notice a third little small space craft which has orange looking bright lights and almost looks like it is charging the space craft it moves across the sky to each of the space craft at approximately 4:30 am and stays with them and then moves to the next one. there are several sitting in the sky every night as soon as it gets dark you can see the space craft which has two yellow/white headlights and red lights on top  there are more than one . these aircraft fly low right over the area and do not make any sounds. my sister and her   daughter watched as the space craft which is in her view point came down from not very far up and flew right over the shell gas station and did not make a sound. you can see these   strange looking space craft fly every night since i first noticed the one which parked next to the cell phone tower it is predictable that it will fly right next to the cell tower again. i have my cell phone full of video recordings for proof that they are extremely low as a cell phone will only reach so high. the smaller orange space craft was as low as the ground early this morning and looked like it has a strange long thing which has a tiny little light or something on the end that extends and stretches out to reach the space craft which are hovering near it like it is really charging them .That is why i believe they can remain here so long and fly every night. i have contacted state police, sheriff���s office, news stations, the airport, nasa, homeland security and anyone who is a professional or a scientist in the field who could come investigate. i am not seeking to claim a hoax or anything of that sort you could see it with your own eyes. i contacted homeland security again this morning after seeing the space craft again last night to please send any one who will be serious .She informed me of the states investigator and i am submitting a report to the their website as well @ www.Mufon.Com  , if the state investigator investigates then they can send you their own documentation or proof if you like. i contacted nasa johnson space center yesterday and they gave me a phone number to call an investigator who they said investigates ufo activity the phone number is (206)722-3000 when i contacted him i was extremely disappointed at his response to me i did not know who are where he was. all i had was a phone number from nasa and did not even know who he was other than nasa telling me to call him. he was extremely short with me and informed me to send a written report along with still photos before anyone will investigate and quickly hung up the phone. he did not even tell me where to send the written report. after the space craft flew over my yard again last night and was hovering so low to the ground early this morning across the street from my house i was highly upset and frightened that something   could actually come so close to my house   and not be heard. i called the number (206)722-3000 back again this morning to ask where to send my report. the man was extremely rude informing me he did not have any more time for me. i stated that i was only calling to ask where to send my report when he asked if i knew who i was calling. i stated i did not and that i received his number from nasa. this guy told me a first grader could file the report and that the tab was right there on the website.  however i did not even know what website. i tried to find information from nasa���s website to file last night and could not find where to send my report.  that is the only reason i called him back to find out where to send my report and video���s .The man also stated that i was not a listener on this planet it was very insulting to me and did not understanding how upset i was. if these craft flew over his house every night for a solid month he would be upset too.  the man did not even give me the information yesterday because he hung up the phone before i could ask where to send the report. i cannot believe his attitude towards me and cannot believe he is the person one has to call for reporting incidents such as this. this guy is more incredible to me than any of these space craft   which are definitely out there every night since i first noticed them in early july. this is the only communication i am sending for your information only. i will only send the hundreds of video���s i have to the state���s office if they send an investigator to see them or request them.  i can only hope they will take it serious and come to investigate. it���s no wonder these three vehicles can sit in our sky all night and come down so freely if no one even believes it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ther are three different type space craft every night in my viewing area and others such as at my sister's apartment one block over my moms house in walker, la. my nieces' house in spring lake livingston parish each of my two sons house in d. s .La

content.detailedDescription: Coming home from an exercise class traveling south on 12th avenue.  turned west onto greenhurst.  a shiny bird caught my eye above the school to my left approx. 100 or so yards away.  upon closer look it wasn't a bird, but, a boomerang shaped metallic object several feet long and wide.  appeared to be only about a hundred feet or so above the ground.  it was traveling just slightly faster than my car and going nearly the same direction. it crossed the road in front of me at an angle approximately 3/4 mile from first sighting location. at that time my view was obstructed by houses and other objects and lost sight.  it made no sound of any kind.  there was no other traffic on the road at the time.
content.summary: Seen while driving home from exercise class.

content.detailedDescription: Hi... my name is tony...I live in a small town outside of rochester ny...I was about the age of 14 when my friend shawn and i noticed a phenomenon that we would refer to as "sposp"... shawn and i liked to cause mischeif when we were younger and went on what we called "night runs" where we would just walk around town in the middle of the night and be hooligans...The first time we encountered the object, shawn and i were walking down a lone country road when we noticed a very bright orange light in the sky... we both said it must be a planet lit up... farther down the road the object seemed to follow us for a moment...The only crafty way to test if we were crazy or not ... we started to sprint for a moment then we stopped abruptly and wouldnt u know that little orange planet stopped after we did!!! we ran home... not maybe 2 weeks later i was suppose to meet up with shawn at about 5a.M.And i lived approximately 2 miles from shawn at the time . it was dark and as i started to ride my bike down the road i looked back and saw sposp looking quite large directly over the road near my house now about a mile away from my location... a little freaked out i looked back another time and saw a second orange dot take straight off from the ground right near my house! took off straight up then changed direction heading directly for me at a rapid speed! now extremely scared i pedaled as hard as i could for the next half mile to shawns... i ran into his house completely tired and petrified...  the last time shawn and i saw sposp was the crowning on all of our experiences... about a month went by and in the middle of the night, shawn and i were standing at the end of my driveway while the whole time, sposp was very close and bright that night... almost an hour went by and the air around us had changed... we both felt it in the air... totally quiet and still... an erie silence... thats when shawn said something that i will never forget... "tony, he said... it's moving"... we both watched as sposp slowly and completely silently started to move toward and over us...Just as the orange ball of light got directly over our heads is when we realized that we were only looking at a small light on a very big object... the triangle shaped craft was approximately an acre wide and moved silently over the trees and we never saw her again...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Most encounters were a small, bright orange light.

content.detailedDescription: We were out on our nightly walk in the tiny gulf town of cedar key, florida. we were both looking out over the gulf of mexico when we saw two very bright flashing lights appear. they seemed to be a couple of miles away, over the water, and moving fast toward each other. i should note that these lights were low over the water, maybe 100 to 200 feet, and much brighter than any airplane lights i've seen. they seemed to be moving at a steady speed, and when they approached each other, the one moving west didn't seem to slow or change coarse. the one moving east however, immediately reversed it's direction without slowing down, and joined the other, moving west right beside it until we could no longer see them (because of trees and a building between us and the water). after taking a few minutes of excited talk about what in the world they could have been, and wondering how anything could move that fast and just change direction, we had no choice but to accept the possibility that they may have not been from "around here". we now look for them every time we walk, with anticipation of another encounter!
content.summary: Two bright flashing lights moving quickly , from opposite directions, maybe a mile or two away. when they met, the one moving east quickly changed direction.

content.detailedDescription: Testing auto-delete of profanity using the word "damn"
content.summary: Cms test case

content.detailedDescription:
A fire alarm had just gone off in the dorm.  all the people in the dorm had to go outside, for a fire drill.  i was groggy, having just been woken up.  i was standing in a parking lot, looking up at the sky, waiting for the dorm staff to give us the o.K. to go back in.  while looking up, i saw this quick flash of light, going up.  it was pink and green and white.  it was traveling in a straight line, going up, almost like it was leaving.  the light looked like a tail of something, like of a moving object.  it was really quick, but really bright and visible against the night sky.  

i had no idea what the strange light was, other than a possible ufo.  several other students saw it as well, and they were just as confused as i was as to what it was.  no one really talked about it the next day, but i remember thinking that it was pretty and mysterious and weird when i saw it.  

there was no noise with the lights, so it wasn't fireworks.  we were near train tracks, but those lights are solely red, and make a lot of noise.  every possible explanation as to what it was hasn't explained it.
content.summary: Strange light flashing in sky

content.detailedDescription: I've been seeing orb-like ufo's nearly every night ever since i purchased a 200mw green laser from an online source. it started about one year ago when i received my laser in the mail. i was showing the kids how to play with the cats and how it looks like a star wars light saber. we went outside to shine it in the sky at around 8:00 pm. the moon was out and my older son asked me if the laser would shine to the moon which was towards the west, so i shined it to the moon. then he asked me to shine it at a star so i shined it at a star which was towards the east. then i began to playfully shine it at the ground studying the effect of the beam because it was new to me and i never used a laser before. then out of nowhere my son (who is 8 years old) yells out "dad! what is that"?! i turned to look up to see what he was looking at. there in the sky, was a very slow moving extremely bright white light just above the tree line. it was moving from north to south and crossed exactly over the path of where i had just directed a laser beam at the moon. when i realized this i turned to see if something might be in the path of the other beam that i directed towards the star and behold, there was another one moving the same direction, parallel, and at the same rate of speed (very slow, almost a hover). well, i became so frightened that i yelled to the kids to get in the house. my two sons and i ran swiftly to the door, and as i got the kids in the house i turned and watched the two craft join up/ meet together just above the tree line and wink off as if they had their hands on a dimmer switch or something. gone! ever since that night, nearly every night, i have been seeing, with the unaided-eye, bright balls/ orbs of light at all altitudes, intensity, speeds and quantity ranging from tree-line to edge of the atmosphere coming and going in every direction. on several occasion the "craft" appeared or materialized precisely where i aimed my laser beam. it stopped/ hovered and gradually got so bright that i thought it was shooting straight at me, then suddenly disappeared. on other occasions i witnessed unusual, inconsistent, extremely bright, bi-location strobing of two "craft" perfectly synchronized. i'v seen twice now "unusual" meteor-like objects that do not fall, but rise at a gradual angle and zip by at a perfectly parallel trajectory with the ground. one of these incidences originated from the strobe-like "craft". finally, i have been experiencing episodes of sleep paralysis which is quite terrifying. when i'm outside, i seem to be able to "feel" when one of these "craft" are near and/ or visible. until this past year, i was never afraid of anything except for maybe nuclear war. since i was a young boy i would always go camping, biking and hiking alone until last year. now i only go within arms reach of the front door to see the very thing that frightens me the most. ufo's
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Circle,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: I've been seeing orb-ufo's do strange things over my home ever since i purchased this laser.

content.detailedDescription: I've been seeing orb-like ufo's nearly every night ever since i purchased a 200mw green laser from an online source. it started about one year ago when i received my laser in the mail. i was showing the kids how to play with the cats and how it looks like a star wars light saber. we went outside to shine it in the sky at around 8:00 pm. the moon was out and my older son asked me if the laser would shine to the moon which was towards the west, so i shined it to the moon. then he asked me to shine it at a star so i shined it at a star which was towards the east. then i began to playfully shine it at the ground studying the effect of the beam because it was new to me and i never used a laser before. then out of nowhere my son (who is 8 years old) yells out "dad! what is that"?! i turned to look up to see what he was looking at. there in the sky, was a very slow moving extremely bright white light just above the tree line. it was moving from north to south and crossed exactly over the path of where i had just directed a laser beam at the moon. when i realized this i turned to see if something might be in the path of the other beam that i directed towards the star and behold, there was another one moving the same direction, parallel, and at the same rate of speed (very slow, almost a hover). well, i became so frightened that i yelled to the kids to get in the house. my two sons and i ran swiftly to the door, and as i got the kids in the house i turned and watched the two craft join up/ meet together just above the tree line and wink off as if they had their hands on a dimmer switch or something. gone! ever since that night, nearly every night, i have been seeing, with the unaided-eye, bright balls/ orbs of light at all altitudes, intensity, speeds and quantity ranging from tree-line to edge of the atmosphere coming and going in every direction. on several occasion the "craft" appeared or materialized precisely where i aimed my laser beam. it stopped/ hovered and gradually got so bright that i thought it was shooting straight at me, then suddenly disappeared. on other occasions i witnessed unusual, inconsistent, extremely bright, bi-location strobing of two "craft" perfectly synchronized. i'v seen twice now "unusual" meteor-like objects that do not fall, but rise at a gradual angle and zip by at a perfectly parallel trajectory with the ground. one of these incidences originated from the strobe-like "craft". finally, i have been experiencing episodes of sleep paralysis which is quite terrifying. when i'm outside, i seem to be able to "feel" when one of these "craft" are near and/ or visible. until this past year, i was never afraid of anything except for maybe nuclear war. since i was a young boy i would always go camping, biking and hiking alone until last year. now i only go within arms reach of the front door to see the very thing that frightens me the most. ufo's
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Circle,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like

content.detailedDescription:
Saw whitest light,  huge compared to stars,  caught my eye, as i stared at sky looking for satellites. i turned and looked to west,  nearly straight up,  saw this light.  much bigger than the iss i have seen orbit,  then some sparkles appeared at its tail end,  and these were yellow.  i thought i may have witnessed a satellite burning up in the atmosphere,  but wouldn't it have gone faster and created more of a show and burned longer.
i observed this for only about 7-10 seconds,  maybe a bit longer.  when the sparks appeared at the tail end,  the thingy just disappeared shortly after. it was a huge patch of white and no way this can be compared to a star or a shooting star.  i welcome any suggestions as to what it could have been.
content.summary: Whitest light,  huge compared to stars,  few seconds then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were staying in a hotel in barstow overnight as we made our way along route 66 to needles. we were in the back of the parking lot of the hotel watching the sunset and talking when i noticed this dark cigar shaped object sitting motionless in the sky. fortunately i had a camera with me and the lens was a 70-200 mm zoom that allowed me to look at the object closer . i also shot a few frames of the object. at first the object was pretty large but seemed to be slowing getting smaller. i did shoot 3 frames of the object over a 1-2 min period and you can see the object has changed shape in a short length of time. additionally i noticed that there seemed to be many small objects directly above the large object. these smaller objects seemed to be moving in a excited state like boiling water. they are very faint and are very close to the primary object. you can just make them out in the enlarged sections i have pasted on the main photo. very interesting to watch them. i just wish i had shot more photos. my girlfriend and i did observe the object slowly dissipate to nothing but it did keep the general shape of a cigar to the end. later i got to thinking about the object and the proximity of the object to edwards afb in california. i have included a map that will show you  my approximation based on the sunset and the location of the hotel i was staying. i guess i have triangulated the possible position of the object based on my location and the sunset and the position of the object in relation to the sunset. needless to say this observation contributed greatly to our the adventure of traveling in the desert on rt 66.
content.summary: Cigar-shaped ufo in the desert

content.detailedDescription:
On april 21, 2011 i met with a realtor in deming, new mexico for the purpose of listing 1.5 acres for sale in the florida mountains. the property is approximately 10 miles southwest of deming, nm on coyote road and the coordinates are as follows: n32◦10.505' w107◦38.523'.

i visited the realtor in her office on the morning of april 21 and she then traveled to the property that afternoon for the purpose of taking photographs. the photos are used in promotional material for property sales. 

after returning to the deming office, the realtor downloaded the photos and then went home to fix dinner. following dinner she reviewed the photos, saving some and rejecting others. this is when she discovered the photo containing the anomaly. she saved that photo, but did not use it in any of the sales material. 

she did not see the see the anomaly while taking photos of my property and only saw it when reviewing the photos later at home. she tells me that she heard no noise while taking the photos.

yesterday, august 5, 2011, i visited the realtor in her office for an update regarding the sale of my property. it was during this meeting with her that she showed me the photo, saying that she did not include it in the sales material. i then asked that she email the photo to me and i asked that she not share it with anyone. she told me that she has not given the photo to anyone. i asked if i may use her name in the event someone wanted to speak with her about the photo and she agreed. 

the details of the photo included with this statement is as follows: the photo is looking due south at the florida mountains (blm land). the fence runs along coyote road, which is not seen in the photo. my property is just north of the fence. 

the object may be seen in the photo just to the right of center and directly above the eroded peaks of the florida's. the object appears to be oval with a shaded underbelly and a silver or light colored top that may be reflecting the sun. one must zoom in in order to see the object more clearly. over zooming, however, will pixelate the object and washout any resolution.

the photo is untouched and is in precisely the same state as it was given to me by the realtor.
content.summary: Deming nm realtor takes photos of property for sale and later observes an anomoly while reviewing photos.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from iowa to merriam,ks. with my granddaughter, 10, in the backseat, right side; it was just the two of us.  i was going south on 635, right before it turns into metcalf, crossing over i-35 and she said "i see something above the highway", i-35, and told me it was a triangle with lights, dark in color; was stationary when she saw it. i could not turn around and look myself because of the traffic. this occurred approx. 6:30 pm on thursday 5-26-11
content.summary: Granddaughter,10, looked out back window & saw dark, triangular object with lights

content.summary: Granddaughter,10, looked out back window & saw dark, triangular object with lights

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out of my window in my house when i saw the disk-like object flying through the sky, it was obviously not a plane and moved faster than one, but still took a while to move across the sky because of its distance. after much thought the only conclusion i can come to is that it was a ufo, we have no testing grounds near by and even planes are not that common. i caught a snap of it just before it went behind a cloud.
content.summary: The shape flew across the sky, faster than an airplane does but it was quite far away, i was just able to grab my phone for a picture as it went behind a cloud.

content.detailedDescription: at approx. 7pm, observed what appeared to be a wingless white reflective jet traveling east at approx. 20,000 feet. (object only took 15 sec. to cross the sky, verses 1-2 minutes like other aircraft at that altitude). ten minutes later, the same object was observed traveling west on the same flight path. again, the same object was observed traveling east on the same flight path after another ten minutes. viewed the object thru binoculars and observered no wings, windows, or engines on what could otherwise be mistaken for a jet flying in the distance. at 7:50pm, a black helicopter (blackhawk) with no markings flew over my neighborhood at less than 300 feet altitude also traveling east. the blackhawk was low enough to see the sidedoor open and crewmembers dressed in black swat type uniforms looking out the side door.
content.summary: Appeared to be a wingless jet followed by a black helicopter
